description: Monitors Kubernetes cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory / Filesystem usage as well as individual pod, containers, systemd services statistics. Uses cAdvisor metrics only.

panels.title: Filtered Object(s) Memory usage รท Filtered Node(s) Total Memory (%)

targets.expr: sum(sum by (kubernetes_io_hostname, kubernetes_io_role) (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total {image!="", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$",pod=~"^$Pods$",container=~"^$Containers$"}[3m])) * 100) / sum(sum by (kubernetes_io_hostname, kubernetes_io_role) (machine_cpu_cores {kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"}))

panels.title: Filtered Object(s) CPU Usage  รท Filtered Node(s) Total CPU (%)

targets.expr:
(
  label_replace(sum by (kubernetes_io_hostname, kubernetes_io_role) (rate (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"}[3m])) * 100, "kubernetes_io_role", "worker", "kubernetes_io_role", "node") / 
  label_replace(sum by (kubernetes_io_hostname, kubernetes_io_role) (machine_cpu_cores{kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"}), "kubernetes_io_role", "worker", "kubernetes_io_role", "node")
)

sum by (pod, namespace) (container_memory_usage_bytes{image!="", pod=~"^$Pods$", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"}) / ignoring (pod, namespace) group_left sum(machine_memory_bytes{kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"})*100

sum by (pod, namespace, kubernetes_io_hostname)(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="", pod=~"^$Pods$",  kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"}[5m])) * 100 / ignoring (pod, namespace, kubernetes_io_hostname)  group_left sum (machine_cpu_cores{kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"})

sum by (pod,container, namespace) (container_memory_usage_bytes{image!="", pod=~"^$Pods$",container=~"^$Containers$", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"}) / ignoring (pod,container, namespace) group_left sum(machine_memory_bytes{kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"})*100

sum by (pod, container, namespace, kubernetes_io_hostname)(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",pod=~"^$Pods$",container=~"^$Containers$", kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"}[5m])) * 100 / ignoring (pod,container, namespace, kubernetes_io_hostname)  group_left sum (machine_cpu_cores{kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$"})

label_replace(100 * sum by(node) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"}), "kubernetes_io_hostname", "$1", "node", "(.*)") / on(kubernetes_io_hostname) group_left() sum by(kubernetes_io_hostname, kubernetes_io_role) (machine_memory_bytes)

label_replace(100 * sum by(node,pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",pod=~"^$Pods$",container=~"^$Containers$"}), "kubernetes_io_hostname", "$1", "node", "(.*)") / on(kubernetes_io_hostname) group_left() sum by(kubernetes_io_hostname, kubernetes_io_role) (machine_memory_bytes)

label_replace(100 * sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"}), "kubernetes_io_hostname", "$1", "node", "(.*)") / on (kubernetes_io_hostname) group_left() sum (machine_cpu_cores{kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node"}) by (kubernetes_io_hostname, kubernetes_io_role)

title: Pod3 Kubernetes cluster monitoring dashboard
